    Class
    Description
    class 
    ClearCall
    ClearCall clears the visible bounds of the window
    class

    DrawCircle renders a center-origin circle to the window
    class

    DrawImage renders an image to the window
    class

    DrawLine renders a line to the window

    DrawRect renders a center-origin rect to the window

    DrawRoundRect renders a center-origin rounded rectangle to the window
    class

    DrawShape is an abstract draw call to render a shape to the window
